name: Orbitz Planet Simulator
description:
Each level is a tricky set of satellites to synchronize. Don’t smash into your satellites!

This game is a new, satisfying zen puzzle! You can’t stop watching all these space bodies floating around!

NO ADS, NO IAP. ONLY ENDLESS SPACE

Features:
►One Tap Controls
►Quick but Challenging Levels
►Rich Space Graphics
►Various planets and satellites
►Satisfying zen balance gameplay
►Pure game
►Optimized Battery Consumption
►Flawless Animations

WARNING! Extremely addictive.
